data.label: 思必驰
data.description: 基于语音的人机交互，一直都是带着神秘的面纱，给广大需要使用这个能力的设备、应用的开发者带来不少的困惑。为了让大家能比较容易为设备进行语音赋能，思必驰基于自己近十多年的深度研发，基于全链路语音技术推出 DUI 平台及 DUI 语音系统，旨在为大家降低进入门槛，为您的设备、应用赋能语音交互能力，给您服务的用户带来全新的体验。

data.label: Sibichi
data.description: Voice-based human-computer interaction has always been shrouded in mystery, causing a lot of confusion for developers who need to use this capability in their devices and applications. To make it easier for everyone to empower devices with voice, iFlytek has launched the DUI platform and DUI voice system based on its nearly ten years of deep research and full-chain voice technology, aiming to lower the entry threshold and empower your devices and applications with voice interaction capabilities, bringing a new experience to the users you serve.
